headline: Republican Senator Says Briefing Is ‘Demeaning’
abstract: Mr. Lee lashed out after he said he was chided by a top administration official for questioning President Trump’s Iran strategy.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — Senator Mike Lee of Utah, a libertarian-leaning Republican, has always been a loud but lonely voice in his party clamoring to rein in presidential war powers, so it came as little surprise on Wednesday when he questioned President Trump’s decision to strike Iran’s most important general.
keywords: United States Defense and Military Forces
